title: How to Attract a Taurus Man Long Distance

steps.title: Taurus guys like to take their time in relationships.
steps.content: Taurus guys like to take their time in relationships. Respect his boundaries by keeping things polite and friendly until he initiates more. Feel free to flirt, but keep your flirts clean and classy. He'll withdraw if your messages get too risque, but your Taurus will enjoy a sweet and subtle comment here and there. Talk about things you have in common to start off. Focus on more practical things, as a Taurus is very down-to-earth. Ask fun and easy questions to catch his interest. Bring up his favorite hobbies, or compare television shows you both like.

steps.title: The way to a Taurus man's heart is through his stomach.
steps.content: The way to a Taurus man's heart is through his stomach. [1] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Snap a picture of your best homemade meals and send him a text about it, or suggest swapping recipes with him. You could even have a dinner date using each other's recipes. Good food and culinary skills are sure to impress him! Plan a time to cook with one another over a video call. Your Taurus loves the warmth and comforts of home, so he won't mind long-distance dates. Cooking and dining at his own table is more fun than a night out to him!

steps.title: Admire your Taurus's steadfast loyalty, good looks, and sweet nature.
steps.content: Admire your Taurus's steadfast loyalty, good looks, and sweet nature. Figure out the parts of him that you like the most, and text him with a thoughtful compliment. He wants to feel appreciated by his significant other‚Äîespecially when those compliments are detailed and specific. [2] X Research source "I saw the picture you posted on Instagram today! You looked so cute in that sweater. üòâ" "They say long distance is hard, but it's easy to be with someone so kind and reliable! You're the best." Tauruses can sense dishonesty, so make sure all of your compliments are genuine.

steps.title: Ruled by Venus, Taurus men have an eye for beauty.
steps.content: Ruled by Venus, Taurus men have an eye for beauty. He wants to see you looking your best as much as he wants to talk to you. While you can't see him in person, you can send flattering photos of yourself to catch his interest. Your Taurus will love elegant selfies with your hair, makeup (if you wear it), and clothes all perfectly in place. Send him a text along the lines of, "Check out this new outfit I just bought! What do you think?" or a selfie with you and your pet reading, "We're all cozied up on this rainy afternoon! üòä" Wear fitted clothes that complement your body and incorporate earthy colors like green and blue. As an earth sign, he'll find those more visually pleasing. Taurus guys tend to be more conservative, so refrain from sending nudes or revealing photos. He might express interest in steamier texts but keep it simple until then and leave something to his imagination.

steps.title: Taurus guys particularly value material success.
steps.content: Taurus guys particularly value material success. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. If you're doing well financially, make sure to acknowledge it when talking to him. You don't have to use a ton of detail‚Äîjust mention your success and talk about your best money-saving habits to impress him. Tell him a little about your career and ambitions, too, so that he knows you're driven and sensible. Taurus guys also have a taste for the finer things, so you don't have to act like you're frugal all the time. Just show him that you have good judgment and know how to tell a quality purchase from an unnecessary one.

steps.title: This sign works hard and appreciates recognition for his efforts.
steps.content: This sign works hard and appreciates recognition for his efforts. If he texts you about a busy work week, send him an encouraging message. When he gets a promotion or scores his dream job, send a congratulatory text to make him feel special. If he needs to vent, offer to lend an ear. Someone who cares for him that much will definitely be relationship material to a Taurus guy! [4] X Research source "Good luck at work today! Either way, wanted you to know that I care."

steps.title: He's very physical and loves gifts that engage all of his senses.
steps.content: He's very physical and loves gifts that engage all of his senses. Send something simple but heartfelt that appeals to his sensual nature. [5] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Smell, taste, touch, sight, and hearing are all important. You might be far apart, but with a little creativity, you can delight him from miles away. You could send him a home-cooked snack and entice him with the smell and taste of good food. Write him a letter and spray it with a signature scent that will make him think of you whenever he smells it. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Speak in a soft, smooth tone and leave him a voice message that he can listen to whenever he misses you.

steps.title: Vulnerability is hard for a Taurus, so let him get to know you better first.
steps.content: Vulnerability is hard for a Taurus, so let him get to know you better first. [7] X Research source Be vulnerable with him and share personal details that let him see the real you. When he's serious about a relationship, he wants to feel totally comfortable with his significant other. Taking the initiative and letting your guard down first will show your Taurus that it's safe for him to do the same. Tell him stories about your childhood that you would only tell a close friend and confide in him when you need to vent. A Taurus guy can come off as logical and analytical at first, but deep down, he's passionate about love and relationships. As you get closer, it'll be easier for both of you to be vulnerable with one another.

steps.title: Taurus guys are extremely loyal and don't like competition.
steps.content: Taurus guys are extremely loyal and don't like competition. Once you start chatting with a Taurus guy, make it clear that you're not talking to anybody else. Your Taurus guy is as good as his word: he won't stray or play the field. Do the same and be exclusive to attract his attention and earn his trust! [8] X Research source

steps.title: A stubborn Taurus doesn't like playing hard-to-get.
steps.content: A stubborn Taurus doesn't like playing hard-to-get. Make the relationship feel easy by answering his calls, responding to his messages, and reaching out to him when you say you will. Taurus guys can be a bit lazy, and they won't put effort into a long-distance relationship that makes them jump through hoops or chase you down. [9] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Figure out the best times to call, text, and FaceTime together and make a plan. Your Taurus loves to stick to a schedule, so part of being dependable is deciding when and how you'll keep in touch.

steps.title: A sincere Taurus needs total honesty from his significant other.
steps.content: A sincere Taurus needs total honesty from his significant other. Staying truthful is how you build trust, which is critical for maintaining a long-distance relationship. A Taurus guy is prone to jealousy, especially when he can't see you in person, but honesty about every aspect of your life will help him relax and commit to the relationship.
